segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's a treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching up high, trying to get those cookies without anyone seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly; I'm scared he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, waiting for him to share some cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both trying to be quiet so the woman won't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is ready to catch the cookies, but he's not being very careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't drop any cookies or, worse, fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, like she's waiting for the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious; she's just drying dishes like nothing's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mix of excitement and potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
